original_text: And a large crowd was following him, because they saw the signs that he was doing on the sick.
korean_text: 큰 무리가 따르니 이는 병자들에게 행하시는 표적을 보았음이러라

sentences.original_text: And a large crowd was following him

sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그 표적들을 보았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: that he was doing on the sick.
